body.name: SHARKPOP Doorbell Camera Wireless, WiFi Video Doorbell, for Indoor/Outdoor Surveillance, Ring Chime Included, Smart Human Detection, 2-Way Audio, Night Vision, Cloud Storage, Live View

features: Secure Cloud Storage Options: Enjoy AES-128 encrypted cloud storage with an optional subscription plan (sold separately). Take advantage of a 30-day free trial for uninterrupted recording, reviewing, and sharing.
AI-Enhanced Human Detection: Utilize advanced AI technology to accurately identify people while filtering out irrelevant motion, such as cars and trees.
Real-Time Two-Way Communication: Easily interact with visitors from any location in real-time.
Cutting-Edge Night Vision Capabilities: Six infrared lights and a smart IR sensor provide crisp, high-resolution videos in low-light conditions, both day and night.
Powerful 2.4GHz Wi-Fi Connectivity: Exclusively designed for 2.4GHz Wi-Fi, ensuring fast and stable connections (5GHz Wi-Fi not supported).

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Doorbell Camera Wireless, WiFi Video Doorbell, for Indoor/Outdoor Surveillance

Real Time 2-Way Communication Easily interact with visitors from any location in real-time. Cutting-Edge Night Vision Six infrared lights and a smart IR sensor provide crisp, high-resolution videos in low-light conditions, both day and night. AI-Enhanced Human Detection Utilize advanced AI technology to accurately identify people while filtering out irrelevant motion, such as cars and trees. Share Device with Family It supports up to 8 users to access the doorbell. Share the device with your family, so everyone gets access.

With Doorbell Chime Elevate your experience with the added convenience of a doorbell chime, easily installed in your preferred areas like the living room, kitchen. 2.4GHz Wi-Fi Connectivity Exclusively designed for 2.4GHz Wi-Fi, ensuring fast and stable connections (5GHz Wi-Fi not supported). Weatherproof Resilience With an IP65 dustproof and waterproof rating, this doorbell camera is designed to withstand a variety of weather conditions, delivering security. Encrypted Cloud Storage Access your videos anytime, even if your doorbell goes offline, is stolen, or damaged, ensuring your footage remains within reach. (Sold separately)

Effortless Installation Easily set up your doorbell using the included adhesive tape or two screws. What's in the box: Doorbell Camera x 1, Rechargeable Battery x 2, USB Indoor Chime x 1, Adhesive Tape x 1, Screw Pack x 1, USB Charging Cablex 1, User Manual x 1

How many days does the doorbell camera work on a full charge? Typically, you can expect the doorbell camera's battery to last 1 to 3 months on one charge, but it varies with the number of recordings. More frequent recordings and regular Live View usage will deplete the battery faster. Is remote access to the doorbell camera available via a smartphone application? Absolutely, you have the capability to view the video via the Aiwit app. Does this doorbell camera let you store videos up in the cloud? Videos are saved only with a cloud service subscription, which includes a trial period. Should the service meet your needs, the subscription begins automatically after the trial, but cancellation is free within the trial period if you’re dissatisfied Can the doorbell camera connect to 5GHz Wi-Fi networks? This doorbell camera is designed for 2.4G Wi-Fi only. Split your Wi-Fi into two - one for 2.4GHz and another for 5GHz. Ensure they're differently named for the camera to connect correctly. Do I need an SD card for the doorbell camera? This doorbell camera doesn't support SD cards. It uses cloud storage, which you can try for free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Aiwit doorbell camera
reviews.reviewText: Easy installation, sound quality is great along with connectivity. This camera does need to be charged after a while. The battery life is really good depending on the setting you place on the camera. It catches everything so prepare to get a lot of alerts if you live in an apt. Other than that I love my awit door bell camera. Is it affordable and does everything a blink would. You can also share your doorbell feed with someone else. If you have a spouse or children they can also download the app and have access to the doorbell camera as well. I recommend this doorbell for everyone. Instead of drilling my door bell in I used a Velcro stickey to help remove it better when it needs to be charged. The Velcro work just as a screw would, I actually like the Velcro sticky better, easier to maneuver and change the view of the camera as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clear accurate view
reviews.reviewText: It was very easy to install and works well for my purpose. Without costing a fortune to buy or maintain I am able to monitor foot traffic at my door. This is perfect for my fixed income I would recommend to anyone looking for low cost reliable doorbell camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So far worth the purchase…
reviews.reviewText: I like that it was quick simple plug and play setup. Issue I have is time lapse from detection to notification even when I’m within 40-100 ft of device and Wi-Fi router. Other then that it does what it should and shows clear and loud. Read a lot about Wi-Fi drop or Bluetooth drop after a while so I will see when I hit 3 months. Paid for subscription since it was fairly inexpensive. Battery life is not bad but definitely not great. I would say about 3 weeks of usage before hitting 20% so I guess…Oh I don’t like that I even when paying for the subscription I can not have access at least on 2 decides. So I can only have the app on my phone and not my tablet in the house and both logged in at the same time… unless I missed it. But could be a better device but heyAgain it was worth the buy and price was in good budget range for what I needed when I needed it.Oh connecting to Alexa or google would be good too but hey…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars More than easy to install, very effective.
reviews.reviewText: This a great door bell for the price. Really good! I also bought a security box for more security because is easy to still. But is an amazing product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing Doorbell Canera 🤗🤩🤩🤩🤩🤩🤩🤩🤩
reviews.reviewText: I love my New doorbell Camera. Battery life is pretty decent. The view of the camera and its recordings are amazing as well as audio. I love the whole wireless option and the fact that I can speak through my phone to communicate to whoever is at my door through the doorbell camera. I also like that you can listen to actual audio during live recordings. The camera is an excellent addition to my home and I am wanting two more for myself and my mom. Thank you so much for creating something so amazing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and reliable
reviews.reviewText: Very simple to install 👌. Very small and compact. The screen is very sharp, and the battery lasts for months on standby and emergency use only.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Super clear images and great sound! It was very easy to set up and use! 5/5 I even bought a second one for my sister!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good camera for the money
reviews.reviewText: I love this camera but was fairly easy to install. I had to take away 1 star because the app that allows you to monitor the videos continuously disconnects. I have to constantly re-login to see the outside view and to access my videos. Other than that. I love it so far. It’s very clear and I love the doorbell function. Great value for the money!
